infra.name: cpm_pcie_qdma
infra.display: Versal ACAP CPM Gen4x8 QDMA EP Design
infra.description: This is Versal ACAP CPM Gen4x8 QDMA Endpoint Design with both Memory Map and Streaming options enabled. It allows generating CPM4 and CPM5 versions for VCK190 and VPK120 respectively based on the board selected. The associated drivers can be downloaded from: https://github.com/Xilinx/dma_ip_drivers
infra.author: Sindhura
search-keywords: Versal ACAP CPM Gen4x8 QDMA EP Design
